Strings.BACKUP_QUESTION: A previous installation of DC++ has been found; backup settings and queue to '$R0'?
Strings.SECTION_LOCAL: Store settings in the user profile directory
Strings.LOCAL_WARNING: Unchecking this box will make DC++ store its settings in the program directory. This is strongly discouraged on Windows Vista and later; settings or downloads might get lost.
Strings.WARNING_LOCALE_ERASED: Warning: the 'locale' directory ($INSTDIR\locale) will be completely erased!
Strings.EXECUTE_QUERY: Installation complete. Do you want to run DC++?
Strings.UN_REMOVE_QUESTION: Also remove queue, settings and the whole DC++ program directory ($INSTDIR) with all of its sub-directories?
Strings.DONATION_INFO_1: Contribute to the Direct Connect Network Foundation
Strings.DONATION_INFO_2: To help the development of DC++ and other DC related software, please consider contributing or donating. Your generous donations will be used for the following:
Strings.DONATION_INFO_5: All donations are completly transparent, will be individually listed and published on the DCNF website, either under your own name or as an anonymous donation, according to your choice.
